entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
